TopicTitle: A good and WORKING BD Armory contract mod?

Articles.Content:
Hello. I've been looking for a contract mod that would enable me to get combat missions, with help of BDArmory.

I saw the 5dim mod, it seems it is broken at the moment, so are there any other mods that do the same thing? 

Thanks in advance!

Edited February 6, 2016 by Spaps

Its not BD armory, but heres a contract pack in working order

 

http://spacedock.info/mod/70/Contract Pack: Giving Aircraft a Purpose (GAP)
